biotools.summary: ArchPRED predicts the structure of loop regions in protein structures based on a fragment-search based method. Given a query loop of unknown structure, ArchPRED identifies which loops of know structures are likely to share conformational similarity with the query loop.

bioschemas.name: ArchPred
bioschemas.summary: ArchPRED predicts the structure of loop regions in protein structures based on a fragment-search based method. Given a query loop of unknown structure, ArchPRED identifies which loops of know structures are likely to share conformational similarity with the query loop.
